reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Medical clinics nutritional mobile emergency for displaced people in Hudaydah Governorate (Phase IV).

description.narrative: (70,000) IDPs received primary health care / (4,200) children and women received therapeutic feeding services / (2,600) IDPs received immunization services / (10800) women received reproductive health services / (15,000) displaced people received Awareness, health education and advancement in the camp environment / providing dressing and follow-up services for (8000) and reducing complications of injuries and their infections while providing medical referral service for (120) patients / continuing to provide treatment and diagnostic services for 112,320 beneficiaries / raising readiness for (1600) cases On diagnostic and treatment services.
Providing health and nutrition services in Al Hudaydah Governorate and its directorates
Save life and maintain its continuity, limit the spread of diseases and epidemics, and secure essential emergency health and nutrition services for the displaced.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
